page.title: 05Transport & Shopping
page.content: Since the only bus-service in the area is to Newbury (Thursday only) it is hardly surprising that 85% of the households own cars (57% have two or more).The bus is used by 24% of the people questioned, mainly older residents. There is a small general store/post office in Ashford Hill and questions about shopping habits showed that most households shopped in one of the local towns ,usually Newbury either weekly or fortnightly. A small proportion shopped more frequently,two or three times a week.
